Structs/WebSocketEvent.html#/s:6Appudo14.name: isText
Structs/WebSocketEvent.html#/s:6Appudo14.abstract: Returns true if data is a text message.

Structs/WebSocketEvent.html.name: WebSocketEvent
Structs/WebSocketEvent.html.abstract: The websocket run receives WebSocketEvent items on events like incomming messages or errors.

Extensions/Socket.html#/s:6Appudo6Socket.name: dataMode
Extensions/Socket.html#/s:6Appudo6Socket.abstract: The normal mode for socket is to store the current login user.

Extensions/Socket.html#/s:6Appudo6Socket.name: data
Extensions/Socket.html#/s:6Appudo6Socket.abstract: If in dataMode the socket can store an Int.

Extensions/Socket.html#/s:6Appudo6Socket.name: notifyComplete
Extensions/Socket.html#/s:6Appudo6Socket.abstract: Normally a run that uses sockets does have notification events when errors happen.

Enums.html#/s:6Appudo18WebSocketEventTyp.name: WebSocketEventType
Enums.html#/s:6Appudo18WebSocketEventTyp.abstract: WebSocketEventType holds the different types of websocket events.
